description:
This talk is to encourage audiences start solving problems in their
everyday’s life by building IoT systems with Python, Raspberry Pi and
sensors. The technologies being used in the project of this talk is not
difficult, but when every pieces of technology comes together, we can
create something that actually helps.

| Agenda:
| 1. Demo video showing the problem, and how we are going to solve it
| 2. Real setup demo
| 3. How the system was initiated, designed and implemented
| – System design overview
| – Hardware – sender and receiver
| – Python code
| – How sender and receiver links together
| 4. Where to buy the hardware needed.
| 5. Q & A
title: IoT in Home – Building a Toilet Vacancy Indicator
